means: 可尊敬地，光荣地，体面地

sentence.Network_en: He also felt she had not behaved honorably in the leadership election.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还认为她在领导人选举中有不端行为。

sentence.Network_en: Haig served his country well and honorably in its extremity.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑格在国家处于走投无路的形势下出色地,体面地为国家尽了职责.

sentence.Network_en: I went away feeling quite satisfied with the whole matter because I had acted honorably.
sentence.Network_cn: 我离开时对整个事情感到颇为满意,因为我的行为诚实无欺.

sentences.en: Will the time never come when we may honorably bury the hatchet?
sentences.cn: 难道我们永远不可能有个体面地休战的时候吗?
